programme.title: The Hurt Locker
programme.desc: Kathryn Bigelow's compelling fact-based, Iraq-set bomb disposal drama was scripted by journalist Mark Boal, drawing on his experiences while embedded with a United States Army Explosive Ordnance Disposal team in 2004. The focus is on the complex characters making up Bravo Company, who disable and destroy improvised explosive devices. The days are ticking down to the end of the bomb squad's tour, but their role puts the team in harm's way around the clock. And it doesn't help that one of the team is addicted to risk taking and pays scant attention to standard procedure, putting other lives in danger, as well as his own. The Hurt Locker provides a tense glimpse into the lives of these extraordinary men, and also probes the various psychologies of people whose job could kill them at any moment, as well as - briefly - exploring how they cope once away from their adrenaline-soaked vocation(n)

Sin City author Frank Miller's sweeping take on the historic Battle of Thermopylae comes to the screen courtesy of Dawn of the Dead director Zack Snyder. Gerard Butler stars as Spartan King Leonidas and Lena Headey plays Queen Gorgo. The massive army of the Persian Empire is sweeping across the globe, crushing every force that dares stand in its path. When a Persian envoy arrives in Sparta offering King Leonidas power over all of Greece if he will only bow to the will of the all powerful Xerxes (Rodrigo Santoro), the strong-willed leader assembles a small army comprised of his empire's best fighters and marches off to battle. Though they have virtually no hope of defeating Xerxes' intimidating battalion, Leonidas' men soldier on, intent on letting it be known they will bow to no man but their king. Meanwhile, back in Sparta, the loyal Queen Gorgo attempts to convince both the skeptical council and the devious Theron (Dominic West) to send more troops despite the fact that many view Leonidas' unsanctioned war march as a serious transgression. As Xerxes' fearsome "immortals" draw near, a few noble Greeks vow to assist the Spartans on the battlefield. When King Leonidas and his 300 Spartan warriors fell to the overwhelming Persian army at the Battle of Thermopylae, the fearless actions of the noble fighters inspired all of Greece to stand up against their Persian enemy and wage the battle that would ultimately give birth to the modern concept of democracy(n)

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: When a former member of the U.S. Army Special Forces returns to his small hometown in rural Washington State hoping to realise a childhood dream of working in the local lumber mill, he discovers that much has changed. The normally tranquil town is now besieged by drugs, outbreaks of violence and a general feeling of malaise and terror, with many pointing a finger at the influence of a crooked casino where his ex-girlfriend now works as a dancer(n)

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: A man whose ideals have been shattered for the last time is out for violent justice in this thriller. Creasy (Denzel Washington) is a former United State intelligence agent-turned-mercenary who has seen too much of the violence and corruption in the world and has become jaded and withdrawn. Creasy is hired to act as a bodyguard for Lupita (nicknamed "Pita", played by (Dakota Fanning), a ten-year-old girl whose wealthy family (a Mexican father and American mother) currently lives in Mexico City, where kidnapping has become a near epidemic. While watching over Pita, Creasy becomes fond of the girl, and finds himself regaining some of his faith in humanity. But things take an ugly turn when Pita is abducted by gunmen who shoot Creasy and leave him to die in the streets. Enraged beyond reason, Creasy recovers and sets out to find the men responsible for kidnapping Pita, no matter who he has to kill along the way. Man on Fire is based on a novel by A.J. Quinnell, which was previously filmed in 1987 with Scott Glenn as Creasy. Christopher Walken, Radha Mitchell, Giancarlo Giannini, and Mickey Rourke highlight the supporting cast for this remake(n)

programme.title: Rush Hour
programme.desc: A Hong Kong inspector and a wisecracking detective team up to find the kidnapped daughter of a Chinese diplomat(n)

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Action thriller about two wisecracking cops forced to swap identities in order to track down $100 million of heroin stolen from the police. Their only lead is a young woman who can identify the culprits, but when they track her down she mistakes one of the cops for his partner, forcing the pair into a bizarre and chaotic life swap(n)

programme.desc: A Hong Kong inspector and a wisecracking detective team up to find the kidnapped daughter of a Chinese diplomat(n)

programme.title: W.
programme.desc: The story of George W. Bush traces the US President's rise to power from a privileged alcoholic to a born-again Christian whose belief in religious destiny helped move him to the top ranks of political power(n)

programme.title: When the Bough Breaks
programme.desc: A young woman agrees to be the surrogate for a married couple, but she soon becomes infatuated with the household's father-to-be in this blend of horror and erotic drama. Although she initially seems stable and normal during an introduction with would-be parents John (Morris Chestnut) and Laura (Regina Hall), Anna (Jaz Sinclair) grows fixated on John and is willing to do whatever it takes to seduce him. Directed by Jon Cassar(n)

programme.title: You Don't Mess With the Zohan
programme.desc: Comedy. A disillusioned Israeli counter-terrorist soldier fakes his own death in order to fulfil his dream of becoming a New York hairdresser, but his past soon catches up with him(n)

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: Apocalyptic thriller in which life on Earth is threatened by a rogue comet. When a reporter in pursuit of a Washington sex scandal is arrested by the FBI, she discovers that the story is an inconsequential part of a huge cover-up. She soon finds herself in possession of the biggest story in the history of humankind: that a comet will destroy the planet in one year's time, unless a risky joint US-Russian outer-space mission can deflect it(n)

programme.title: W.
programme.desc: The story of George W. Bush traces the US President's rise to power from a privileged alcoholic to a born-again Christian whose belief in religious destiny helped move him to the top ranks of political power(n)

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: A former hero of the French and Indian Wars, Benjamin Martin has renounced battle, but conflict with England is imminent, and his eldest son Gabriel is spellbound by the chance to join the fight(n)

programme.title: Rush Hour 2
programme.desc: A wisecracking L.A. cop visits his friend the inspector in Hong Kong, and is drawn into a case involving a mob bigwig and a counterfeiting ring(n)

programme.title: Days of Thunder
programme.desc: Tom Cruise guns the engine in this action drama about a stock-car racer(n)

programme.title: The Firm
programme.desc: Sydney Pollack's film, based on John Grisham's bestseller, stars Tom Cruise as Mitch McDeere, a young lawyer who joins a small but prestigious law firm, only to find out that most of their clients are on the wrong side of the law. The company is helping to launder mob money, get clients off charges and even murder partners who threaten to blow their cover. But when the FBI, in the shape of Wayne Tarrance, come calling to get McDeere's help gathering evidence on his colleagues, he is caught between a rock and a hard place, juggling the risk to his life and his liberty. With Jeanne Tripplehorn, Gene Hackman and Oscar-nominated Holly Hunter(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: New Man. Ghost finds himself trapped in a new business venture. Tommy escapes to Chicago for a meeting that takes a turn. With Ghost released, Jukebox and Kanan revisit their plan to kidnap Tariq(n)

programme.title: Waking Up in Reno
programme.desc: Things get uncomfortable for two couples when a cross-country trip goes awry in this amiable road comedy. Boundaries are broken between the best friends as a shocking revelation leads to hurt feelings and bad behavior(n)

programme.title: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back
programme.desc: Two quirky drug-dealers learn that a comic book about their lives is being made into a Hollywood movie, so they venture cross-country to attempt to stop its production in this cameo-studded stoner comedy(n)

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: Bill Murray plays Phil, an arrogant, selfish TV weatherman in this quirky comedy. After visiting the town of Punxsutawney for the traditional annual weather prediction by a local groundhog, he suddenly finds he's caught in a time warp. Every morning Phil wakes up to the same day. He can remember what happened on previous versions of that day, whereas others involved don't remember the repetition. So he can use his previous experience for his own benefit: to impress a woman, for example. As the days go by Phil starts to see the flaws in his own character, and has a chance to change for the better. But will tomorrow ever dawn? Comedy with a message, in a hugely entertaining family film(n)

programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: Ice Cube co-wrote and stars in this second sequel to the 1995 comedy "Friday," which once again follows a day in the life of two cousins in Los Angeles. This time, Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) are robbed by Santa Claus on Christmas Eve, and the not-so-jolly old elf has made off with their rent money. John Witherspoon, Bebe Drake(n)

programme.title: In the Mix
programme.desc: R&B singer Usher stars in Ron Underwood's crime caper as Darrell, a DJ who, through a series of coincidences, ends up bodyguard to Dolly, daughter of Mafia mobster Frank. The two fall for each other, much to the anger of Frank, who as well as trying to keep control of his daughter, has to contend with a major Mob power struggle. As the bullets fly, Darrell finds he's not only protecting Dolly, but also Frank and himself!(n)

However, the experience only makes him feel more alienated from a society that doesn't truly understand or appreciate the sacrifices of its soldiers(n)

programme.title: Labyrinth of Lies
programme.desc: In this historical drama, idealistic German public prosecutor Johann Radmann (Alexander Fehling) becomes interested in the case of Charles Schulz, a former Nazi officer at Auschwitz who is now a schoolteacher. Radmann initially encounters resistance from the rest of his department when he begins his investigation, but senior prosecutor Walter Friedberg (Robert Hunger-Buhler) ultimately allows him to build as many cases as possible against the 8000 people who worked at the death camp. Helmed by first-time feature-film director Giulio Ricciarelli, Labyrinth of Lies is based on the Frankfurt Auschwitz trials, a previously lesser-known chapter of Germany's post-WWII history in which the country was forced to reckon with the Nazis who returned to everyday life following the end of the war. Germany's official Foreign Language submission for the 2016 Academy Awards. Friederike Becht, Andre Szymanski, and Hansi Jochmann co-star(n)

programme.title: Bats
programme.desc: Horror flick about a scientist and a local sheriff trying to stop deadly and unexplained bat attacks in a small Texas town(n)

programme.title: Cheaper by the Dozen 2
programme.desc: College football coach Tom Baker and his wife, author Kate Baker, have decided its time they took their sizable brood of 12 children on a summer vacation, and so they pack up the cars and take the kids to Lake Winnetka for some camping. Not all the kids are happy about this, but the one who is really annoyed, turns out to be Tom, who discovers his old rival Jimmy Murtaugh is also staying near the lake(n)

programme.title: Dan in Real Life
programme.desc: Advice columnist Dan Burns struggles with his own three kids, but life gets even more complicated when he falls for his brother's new love(n)

programme.title: Jarhead
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal gives a dead-on-target performance as a marine followed from boot camp to his assignment as an elite sniper during Operation Desert Storm. The superb film is based on the memoir of ex-leatherneck Anthony Swofford (Gyllenhaal). Sam Mendes ("American Beauty") directed from a script by William Broyles Jr. Jamie Foxx, Peter Sarsgaard, Chris Cooper, Lucas Black, Brianne Davis, Jacob Vargas(n)

programme.title: The Ghost and the Darkness
programme.desc: Adventure drama about the confrontation between two Europeans and a pair of lions that are obstructing the progress of a railway line in East Africa during the 1890s. When the labourers become so frightened by recurring lion attacks at their campsite that they are reluctant to continue to work, an engineer and a big-game hunter join forces in an attempt to outwit the predators(n)

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: Anarchic, nihilistic satire on modern life in which an office worker who feels emotionally deadened by his consumerist lifestyle has a chance encounter with a charismatic man. Finding that they are kindred spirits, the two men start up a no-holds-barred bare-knuckle fighting club, with the aim of making its members feel 'alive' once again. Based on Chuck Palahniuk's novel(n)

programme.title: Dan in Real Life
programme.desc: Advice columnist Dan Burns struggles with his own three kids, but life gets even more complicated when he falls for his brother's new love(n)

programme.title: Hot Shots! Part Deux
programme.desc: A soldier leaves a monastery to take a mission to rescue his superior officer, who's been kidnapped somewhere in Iraq.(n)

programme.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
programme.desc: From the team that bought Airplane to the screen comes the original Naked Gun (which spawned two sequels), with Leslie Nielsen as Lt Frank Drebin. Drebin foils a plot by arch-criminal Victor Ludwig to assassinate our own dear Queen at a Los Angeles Dodgers baseball game. He's helped by Ludwig's assistant Jane Spencer who has no idea of the dastardly plan and soon agrees to help Drebin, as well as falling in love with him. The plot is paper-thin but the laughs come hot on the heels of each other, made all the funnier by the straight playing of all the leads. Cameo appearances include the late John Houseman and baseball legend Reggie Jackson(n)

programme.title: The Naked Gun 2 1/2: The Smell of Fear
programme.desc: Slapstick gags galore when Lt Frank Drebin (Leslie Nielsen), the world's clumsiest police detective, returns to investigate another case. When he discovers an evil plan being hatched against the American people, Drebin sets out to derail it...with predictably hilarious results!(n)

programme.title: Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult
programme.desc: Slapstick sequel with clueless cop Frank Drebin saving the Oscars from a mad bomber. Comedy(n)

programme.title: Van Wilder: Freshman Year
programme.desc: Van Wilder starts his freshman year at Coolidge College and embarks on an adventure to land the campus hottie and liberate his school from sexual oppression and party dysfunction(n)

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A passenger aboard a spacecraft is awakened from suspended animation by a technical glitch—90 years before the vessel will reach its destination. Desperately lonely, he considers waking up another traveller in order to have a companion(n)

programme.title: Superstar
programme.desc: A mildly hyperactive Catholic schoolgirl tries to find fame as a movie star in order to get the boy she likes to kiss her. This outrageous comedy is based on a recurring sketch from "Saturday Night Live."(n)

programme.desc: Three teenagers plan to burglarise the home of a wealthy blind man, but their heist quickly goes awry as they end up fighting for their lives(n)

programme.title: Walk the Line
programme.desc: Haunted by the early death of his gifted brother, Johnny Cash drifted through the Air Force, a succession of jobs and a marriage before he found his niche. Moving biopic of the country music star(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: After the death of her husband, a woman named Marnie relocates to L.A. to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mum's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others(n)

programme.desc: A passenger aboard a spacecraft is awakened from suspended animation by a technical glitch—90 years before the vessel will reach its destination. Desperately lonely, he considers waking up another traveller in order to have a companion(n)

programme.title: The Messengers
programme.desc: Hong Kong horror directors and brothers Danny and Oxide Pang's Hollywood debut is set in a remote farmhouse in North Dakota. It's the new home of Roy and Denise and their troubled teenage daughter Jess, who they hope will be able to put behind her a traumatic incident in her past. So, when she starts seeing supernatural apparitions, her parents are initially sceptical until the manifestations become more apparent and violent in this chilling horror(n)

programme.title: West of Memphis
programme.desc: Although the infamous case of the West Memphis Three has already been the subject of three first-class documentaries from director Joe Berlinger, Amy Berg's West of Memphis again explores the oft-documented incarceration of three teenagers for a triple homicide that many believe they never committed. Co-produced by one of the three supposedly falsely convicted men, West of Memphis lays out the case for their innocence and details how a number of high-profile figures -- including Eddie Vedder, Johnny Depp, and Natalie Maines -- helped raise money and awareness in order to free the trio. West of Memphis played at the 2012 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Amour
programme.desc: Michael Haneke's critically acclaimed, Oscar-winning drama about a couple in their 80s(n)

programme.title: L'Auberge Espagnole
programme.desc: A man eager to learn Spanish gets an education he wasn't expecting in this comedy drama. Xavier (Romain Duris) is a French economics student who is nearing the completion of his degree and is looking for work. Xavier's father arranges for him to meet a ranking member of the Ministry of Finance, who makes him an offer -- he can give him a good job, but only under the condition that he learn to speak Spanish. Determined not to pass up the opportunity, Xavier enrolls in a language program in Barcelona, despite the misgivings of his girlfriend, Martine (Audrey Tautou). Upon his arrival, Xavier moves into a large house shared by a large group of students from all over Europe. Xavier finds that his ideas and attitudes are challenged in a positive way by the diverse personalities of his housemates, and that his loyalty to Martine is tested by his attraction to Anne-Sophie (Judith Godrèche), a sweet but lonesome woman from France who has been away from her husband for too long. After a visit, most of Xavier's roommates decide they don't much care for Martine and Xavier gets advice on seducing Anne-Sophie from an unexpected source -- Isabelle (Cécile de France), a footloose lesbian living in the house. L'Auberge Espagnole received its world premier at the 2002 Cannes Film Festival, and went on to earn prizes at the 2002 Karlovy Vary International Film Festival, the 2003 Lumière Awards, and the 2003 César Awards(n)

programme.title: Walk the Line
programme.desc: Haunted by the early death of his gifted brother, Johnny Cash drifted through the Air Force, a succession of jobs and a marriage before he found his niche. Moving biopic of the country music star(n)

programme.title: Philadelphia
programme.desc: Hotshot lawyer Andrew Beckett takes his firm to court when he is sacked shortly after the partners discover he has AIDS(n)

programme.title: Amour
programme.desc: Michael Haneke's critically acclaimed, Oscar-winning drama about a couple in their 80s(n)

programme.title: Nick & Norah's Infinite Playlist
programme.desc: After being dumped by his conniving girlfriend, nerdy Nick meets sassy Norah on a crazy night out in the Big Apple. As the two bond over their love of music, their respective exes try to spoil the moment. Comedy(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Wasn't There
programme.desc: Shot in black-and-white and set in small-town California in the late '40s, this latest film from Joel Coen and brother Ethan Coen is a throwback to vintage film noir. Recalling Alfred Hitchcock's Shadow of a Doubt in its setting of Santa Rosa, CA, the story follows the dutiful, passive barber Ed Crane (Billy Bob Thornton), who narrates the tale. A soft-spoken fellow, Ed is greeted by Creighton Tolliver (played by Coen regular Jon Polito), a chatterbox customer who tells Ed that dry cleaning is the wave of the future. When Ed discovers his wife Doris (Frances McDormand) has been cheating on him with her department store boss Big Dave (James Gandolfini), Ed suddenly turns bitterly jealous. He hatches a blackmail scheme to extort money from Big Dave to fund a dry cleaning enterprise, which takes a wrong turn when Big Dave ends up dead. Meanwhile, Doris is charged with Dave's murder, having been found doctoring the books at her job, and Ed hires an impeccable new lawyer (Tony Shalhoub), who proves costly in the midst of his already unraveling life. The film also co-stars Michael Badalucco, Katherine Borowitz, and Scarlet Johanssen(n)

programme.title: The Invisible Woman
programme.desc: An actress wrestles with feelings of guilt and remorse following an affair with Charles Dickens in this gorgeously detailed period drama. Upon the author's death, all evidence of their 13-year romance is effectively erased from the history books(n)

programme.title: An Ideal Husband
programme.desc: Adaptation of Oscar Wilde's 1895 play about a rising young politician who is blackmailed by a socialite, which touches off a series of misunderstandings, romantic complications and drawing-room intrigues(n)

programme.title: Testament of Youth
programme.desc: Free-spirited Vera Brittain overcomes adversity too win a scholarship to Oxford. While there, she falls in love with Roland Leighton and they begin to pursue their dreams together. But, the onset of World War I rips them apart, and Vera learns first hand the horrors and atrocities of war(n)

programme.title: The Hollars
programme.desc: A striving cartoonist is forced to return back to his family when his mother falls ill, while awaiting the birth of his first child(n)

programme.title: Boys Don't Cry
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this drama was adapted from the life of Brandon Teena, born Teena Brandon, a woman who chose to live her life as a man and suffered tragic consequences as a result. In 1993, 20-year-old Brandon (Hilary Swank) leaves Lincoln, Nebraska for the nearby community of Falls City, where she sports a crew cut, favors jeans and boots, and is regarded as a man by most of the people in town. While Brandon's friend Lonny (Matt McGrath) warns her that sexual outsiders aren't looked upon kindly in Falls City, she develops a reputation for being something of a ladies' man, and is soon living with a single mother named Candace (Alicia Goranson). But when Brandon meets teenage Lana (Chloe Sevigny), the two become romantically involved almost immediately. Brandon makes friends with Lana's mother (Jeanetta Arnette) and a burly ex-con named John (Peter Sarsgaard). John and his buddy Tom (Brendan Sexton) run with a rough group of men who like to drink and carouse, and they accept Brandon as one of their own. However, when Brandon ends up in jail on a traffic violation, her secret comes out, and, while Lana stands by Brandon's side, John and Tom feel betrayed -- and their anger soon boils over into violence. A distinguished feature debut for director Kimberly Peirce, Boys Don't Cry was enthusiastically received in its showings at 1999 film festivals in Venice, Toronto, and New York(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Wasn't There
programme.desc: Shot in black-and-white and set in small-town California in the late '40s, this latest film from Joel Coen and brother Ethan Coen is a throwback to vintage film noir. Recalling Alfred Hitchcock's Shadow of a Doubt in its setting of Santa Rosa, CA, the story follows the dutiful, passive barber Ed Crane (Billy Bob Thornton), who narrates the tale. The film also co-stars Michael Badalucco, Katherine Borowitz, and Scarlet Johanssen(n)

programme.title: Barge
programme.desc: A documentary about individuals who find direction working as deckhands on towboats due for the port of New Orleans(n)

programme.title: Broken Flowers
programme.desc: Comedy Starring Bill Murray, Sharon Stone and Jessica Lange. Directed by Jim Jarmusch. As the devoutly single Don Johnston is dumped by his latest girlfriend, he receives an anonymous pink letter informing him that he has a son who may be looking for him. The situation causes Don to examine his relationships with women instead of moving on to the next one, and he embarks on a cross-country search for his old flames who might possess clues to the mystery at hand(n)

programme.title: We Own the Night
programme.desc: Crime drama set in 1980s Brooklyn. A nightclub owner routinely turns a blind eye to the criminal activities under his roof, but when his NYPD father and brother ask him to help them gather intelligence on the Russian mafia, he finds himself torn between family loyalty and protecting himself from the most ruthless criminals in New York City(n)

programme.title: Hotel Rwanda
programme.desc: Terry George's moving, dramatic film is based on a true story from the Rwanda genocide of 1994. Don Cheadle plays Hutu Paul Rusesabagina, the manager of a four-star hotel in the capital Kigali, who's married to Tutsi Tatiana. When the Hutus start massacring Tutsis, he gives refuge to over 1000 Tutsis in the hotel and its grounds. At first, he uses the hotel's stock of beer, wine and spirits to bribe the marauding, murderous Hutu gangs. But as stocks run low, he must use all the diplomatic skills he learnt as a successful manager to save not just the lives of the Tutsis but his own and those of his family. The film also stars Nick Nolte as Col Oliver, a UN representative in the capital who finds himself impotent and without any support as the world abandons Rwanda's Tutsis to their terrible fate(n)

programme.title: The Interpreter
programme.desc: Political thriller about a United Nations worker who believes she's overheard a plot to assassinate an African dictator(n)

programme.title: Where Do We Go Now?
programme.desc: In this comedy-drama, the women of a small village in Lebanon cook up a number of wacky schemes and ruses in the hopes of preventing the local men from starting a religious war(n)

programme.title: Fathers and Daughters
programme.desc: Jake raises his daughter Katie on his own after his wife died in a fatal car accident and he suffered a mental breakdown. He struggles with the daily routines he has to go through to make sure she lives happily. His relatives intend to take Katie away from him but Jake knows that he has to hold on to the one thing that he loves the most - his daughter(n)

programme.title: The Hollars
programme.desc: A striving cartoonist is forced to return back to his family when his mother falls ill, while awaiting the birth of his first child(n)

programme.title: Hysteria
programme.desc: Set in Victorian London, Tanya Wexler's period comedy Hysteria tells the tale of Mortimer Granville (Hugh Dancy), a young doctor disturbed by the way most hospitals ignore the latest research on germ theory, and still treat patients with bleedings and leeches. After being fired from his most recent job for speaking out on the matter, he ends up in the employ of Dr. Robert Dalrymple (Jonathan Pryce) who runs a private practice specializing in treating women who suffer from "hysteria" and come to the doctor for his precise digital manipulations in order to get a release. With the help of Mortimer's best friend Edmund (Rupert Everett) together they create a device that allows these women to achieve the desired result much more quickly. Complicating matters, Mortimer becomes enamored of Dalrymple's strong-willed, feminist-minded daughter Charlotte (Maggie Gyllenhaal). Hysteria played at the 2011 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Broken Flowers
programme.desc: Comedy Starring Bill Murray, Sharon Stone and Jessica Lange. Directed by Jim Jarmusch. As the devoutly single Don Johnston is dumped by his latest girlfriend, he receives an anonymous pink letter informing him that he has a son who may be looking for him. The situation causes Don to examine his relationships with women instead of moving on to the next one, and he embarks on a cross-country search for his old flames who might possess clues to the mystery at hand(n)

programme.title: Little Miss Sunshine
programme.desc: Young Olive is given a shot at the Little Miss Sunshine beauty pageant in California and manages to coerce her family into driving west in their worn-down VW van(n)

programme.title: The Jane Austen Book Club
programme.desc: This charming romantic dramedy chronicles the tangled lives and loves of five California women and one man who form a book club to study the work of Jane Austen. The outstanding cast includes Kathy Baker, Maria Bello, Emily Blunt, Amy Brenneman, Hugh Dancy, Maggie Grace, Lynn Redgrave and Jimmy Smits. Written and directed by Robin Swicord(n)

programme.title: Tamara Drewe
programme.desc: Tamara Drewe returns to the sleepy Dorset village where she grew up to sell her mother's house. Once the big-nosed girl next door, she has had a nose job and is a successful journalist in London. Her old flame Andy is still working for philandering novelist Nicholas Hardiment and his long-suffering wife and, when Tamara begins a relationship with rock drummer Ben Sergeant, there begins a three-way contest for her affections, made more complicated by the dreams of 15-year-old Jody, who wants to grow up and get away from the village just like Tamara(n)

programme.title: Senseless
programme.desc: Broad comedy about a financially-insecure economics graduate who agrees to participate in a drug trial. The drug in question enhances the subject's senses, and he uses his newly-developed powers to get ahead in business. For a while, he enjoys the good life - but then the drug begins to show some unusual side effects(n)

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: A comedy about a soldier who awakens in a world filled with dumb people after becoming involved in a futuristic experiment(n)

programme.title: The Mexican
programme.desc: A clumsy criminal is put in a position where he not only has to save his own skin, but that of his girlfriend in this comedy with strong undercurrents of romance. Jerry Welbach (Brad Pitt) is a low-level Mafia "mechanic" whose ineptitude is countered by frequent (but unpredictable) bursts of dumb luck. Jerry's girlfriend Samantha (Julia Roberts) wants him to get out of the business, and after his latest blunder lands capo Arnold Margolese (Gene Hackman) in jail, so does mid-level crime kingpin Bernie Nayman (Bob Balaban). But Bernie insists that Jerry do one last errand for the mob before they let him find employment elsewhere -- he has to go to Mexico and recover a rare and very valuable pistol, which is said to be cursed. While Samantha objects to Jerry taking the assignment, he isn't in much of a position to argue; Jerry heads south of the border, while Samantha, in a huff, sets out for Las Vegas. Once in Mexico, Jerry finds the pistol easily enough, but making his way back to the States proves to be an unexpected challenge. Meanwhile, Jerry's superiors want insurance that he'll return with the goods, so they hire Leroy (James Gandolfini), a hitman, to kidnap Samantha and hold her hostage until Jerry comes back. However, Samantha and Leroy quickly strike up a friendship, and she soon learns the gunman has a sensitive side he doesn't show to the world -- along with a few other secrets. The Mexican marked the first screen pairing for mega-stars Julia Roberts and Brad Pitt -- though, given the film's narrative arc, they play only a handful of scenes together. The film was directed by Gore Verbinski, who won awards for his work in commercials before breaking through with the quirky family comedy Mouse Hunt(n)

programme.title: Tamara Drewe
programme.desc: Tamara Drewe returns to the sleepy Dorset village where she grew up to sell her mother's house. Once the big-nosed girl next door, she has had a nose job and is a successful journalist in London. Her old flame Andy is still working for philandering novelist Nicholas Hardiment and his long-suffering wife and, when Tamara begins a relationship with rock drummer Ben Sergeant, there begins a three-way contest for her affections, made more complicated by the dreams of 15-year-old Jody, who wants to grow up and get away from the village just like Tamara(n)

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Comedy about two moronic brothers trying to make an impact at the hippest joint in town, with little success(n)

programme.title: It Had to Be You
programme.desc: A Boston publisher falls for a widowed carpenter she hired to do repair work. Star Faye Dunaway's foray into series TV was a disappointment; only four episodes aired(n)

programme.title: Sydney White
programme.desc: Modern American retelling of the fairytale Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs. Sydney White goes away to college and enrols in the same sorority house her mother used to be in, only to find that girls these days aren't as nice as her mother. Moving in with seven social outcasts in the run-down frat house next door, she takes on the system and tries to show the cool kids how selfish their hierarchy has become(n)

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: When the Golden Child (J. L. Reate), a Tibetan holy figure, is kidnapped from a sacred temple by agents of the forces of evil, it is up to Los Angeles child finder Chandler Jarrell (Eddie Murphy) to rescue him(n)

programme.title: The Mexican

The film was directed by Gore Verbinski, who won awards for his work in commercials before breaking through with the quirky family comedy Mouse Hunt(n)

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: A comedy about a soldier who awakens in a world filled with dumb people after becoming involved in a futuristic experiment(n)

programme.title: Nothing Like the Holidays
programme.desc: Puerto Rican siblings reunite for Christmas amid the impending divorce of their parents(n)

programme.title: The Ringer
programme.desc: A guy trying to do the right thing ends up taking part in one of the most morally dubious con games in history in this comedy. Steve Barker (Johnny Knoxville) is an office drone who wants to move up the corporate ladder, but when he asks his boss for a promotion, it comes with a condition -- Steve has to fire Stavi (Luis Avalos), who has been the firm's janitor for years. Steve decides to soften the blow by hiring Stavi to do his lawn and garden work. However, an accident robs Stavi of several of his fingers, and since he doesn't have medical insurance, Steve needs to find a way to pay for his surgery. Steve's uncle Gary (Brian Cox), a sleazy type who will bet on anything, also needs some fast cash, and comes up with a get-rich-quick scheme -- Steve was a track star in high school, and with the Special Olympics Championships coming up, all Steve has to do is pretend to be mentally challenged, enter the competition, and win the running events against six-time medalist Jimmy (Leonard Flowers). Gary will bet big on Steve, and the odds will allow them to clean up. Steve is appalled by the idea, but he needs the money badly enough to go along. However, Steve discovers that Jimmy is fast enough that he has little chance of beating him. However, Jimmy's colossal ego has made him many enemies among his fellow Special Olympians, and they're eager enough to see him taken down a peg that they help Steve train for the big event. Matters become all the more complicated when Steve becomes infatuated with Lynn (Katherine Heigl), a beautiful woman who has volunteered to help the challenged athletes, and would doubtless be furious if she found out what Steve was really doing. Produced by Peter Farrelly and Bobby Farrelly, The Ringer was the first fiction directorial credit for Barry W. Blaustein; the story also parallels a 2004 episode of the animated television series South Park, "Up the Down Steroid."(n)

programme.title: The Bronze
programme.desc: A former Olympic gymnast, still clinging to her fame as a bronze-medal winner, is forced to train an up-and-coming tumbler. However, she tries to sabotage the young athlete in order to preserve her own small-town celebrity in this wacky comedy-drama(n)

programme.title: Vamps
programme.desc: Radiant New York City vampires Goody (Alicia Silverstone) and Stacy (Krysten Ritter) find their immortality in question after they learn that true love endures in the realm of the undead. Meanwhile, Russian bloodsucker Vadim (Justin Kirk) prowls the streets in search of the next big thrill, Dr. Van Helsing (Wallace Shawn) seeks to exterminate the creatures of the night, and young Joey Van Helsing (Dan Stevens) develops an unusual fixation on Stacy. As ravenous vampire Cisserus (Sigourney Weaver) presides over her dark dynasty with the help of her loyal assistant Ivan (Todd Barry), oddball Renfield (Zak Orth) strives to impress Stacy and Goody by any means necessary. Amidst all of the bloodshed and intrigue, nefarious vampire Vlad (Malcolm McDowell) works to perfect his knitting skills(n)

programme.title: It Had to Be You
programme.desc: A Boston publisher falls for a widowed carpenter she hired to do repair work. Star Faye Dunaway's foray into series TV was a disappointment; only four episodes aired(n)

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Comedy about two moronic brothers trying to make an impact at the hippest joint in town, with little success(n)

programme.title: Sydney White
programme.desc: Modern American retelling of the fairytale Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs. Sydney White goes away to college and enrols in the same sorority house her mother used to be in, only to find that girls these days aren't as nice as her mother. Moving in with seven social outcasts in the run-down frat house next door, she takes on the system and tries to show the cool kids how selfish their hierarchy has become(n)

programme.title: Sweet Home Alabama
programme.desc: Reese Witherspoon is a delight in this romantic comedy. She plays a successful fashion designer who's engaged to the wealthy son of New York City's mayor. But love takes a detour when she goes back home to get a divorce from her estranged hubby and finds herself falling for the good ol' boy once again. Josh Lucas, Patrick Dempsey, Candice Bergen(n)

programme.title: The First $20 Million Is Always the Hardest
programme.desc: Based on Po Bronson's 1997 novel, this comedy stars Adam Garcia as a marketing wiz who joins the late '90s dot-com revolution in Silicon Valley. His quest to create the next generation of computers is threatened, though, by a digital guru (Enrico Colantoni) and a syndicate of corporate swindlers. Jake Busey, Rosario Dawson, Ethan Suplee, Anjul Nigam, Gregory Jbara, Dan Butler(n)

programme.title: The Birdcage
programme.desc: Flamboyant Hollywood remake of the 1979 French farce La Cage Aux Folles. When his son's conservative future in-laws come to town, gay club owner Armand and his cross-dressing partner Albert are forced to play husband and wife(n)

programme.title: Bucky Larson: Born to Be a Star
programme.desc: Adam Sandler co-writes and produces this Columbia Pictures comedy starring Nick Swardson as Bucky Larson, a nerd from nowhere who heads out West to become a porn star after finding out his parents were ones themselves. Upon arriving in Hollywood, a waitress (Christina Ricci) with self-esteem issues gets him situated in the slightly less seedy part of town. Meanwhile, Bucky connects with a friend of his parents, Miles Deep (Don Johnson), who pities the backwards man-child and gives him a shot in the world of porn - only to discover that he's severely lacking in both experience and manliness. Through sheer luck, the footage of Bucky becomes a viral hit on the internet and he is propelled to the top of the adult film business, irking the current king of porn actors, Dick Shadow (Stephen Dorff), who'll do anything to not be in the shadow of the small time fool. The Hot Chick's Tom Brady handled directing duties(n)

programme.title: Sweet Home Alabama
programme.desc: Reese Witherspoon is a delight in this romantic comedy. She plays a successful fashion designer who's engaged to the wealthy son of New York City's mayor. But love takes a detour when she goes back home to get a divorce from her estranged hubby and finds herself falling for the good ol' boy once again. Josh Lucas, Patrick Dempsey, Candice Bergen(n)

programme.title: The Night Before
programme.desc: Three childhood friends who get together every Christmas Eve plan one last epic night out to celebrate the end of an era(n)

programme.title: The Birdcage
programme.desc: Flamboyant Hollywood remake of the 1979 French farce La Cage Aux Folles. When his son's conservative future in-laws come to town, gay club owner Armand and his cross-dressing partner Albert are forced to play husband and wife(n)

programme.title: Prime
programme.desc: A recent divorcée begins a relationship with her therapist-friend's younger son in this by-the-numbers romantic comedy(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: New Man. Ghost finds himself trapped in a new business venture. Tommy escapes to Chicago for a meeting that takes a turn. With Ghost released, Jukebox and Kanan revisit their plan to kidnap Tariq(n)

programme.title: The Watcher
programme.desc: James Spader stars as burnt-out FBI agent Joel Campbell, whose attempts to catch a serial killer terrifying Los Angeles end in failure. Moving to Chicago, he seeks psychiatric help from Dr Polly Beilman but then finds his past has come back to haunt him. The killer, David Allen Griffin, has tired of life in the sun and followed him to the Windy City. He taunts Campbell by sending him photographs of the next victim, giving the agent just 24 hours to find them before he kills them. As the murders begin again, Campbell realises he must catch Griffin to lay his own demons to rest, but Griffin's next intended victim is one Campbell knows too well. Joe Charbanic's debut feature is a taut thriller with Spader and Reeves on top form as protagonists who are two sides of the same coin(n)

programme.title: Freedom Song
programme.desc: Danny Glover reveals the impact of the 1960s civil rights movement on a small Southern town in the compelling drama Freedom Song(n)

programme.title: Something From Nothing: The Art of Rap
programme.desc: In this riveting documentary, Ice-T explores the heart and soul of hip-hop music by speaking with some of the most-respected artists ever to step up to the mic(n)

programme.title: Empire State
programme.desc: A pair of old friends scheme to rob an armored car company with a cop hot on their tail in this crime drama from director Dito Montiel. Liam Hemsworth and Dwayne Johnson star in the Emmet/Furla Films production(n)

programme.title: Soul Plane
programme.desc: Method Man and Kevin Hart star as the owners of an airline that caters to a black clientele in this outrageously funny takeoff on "Airplane!" Look for a top-flight performance by Snoop Dogg as a pilot who likes to get high both on and off the ground. Mo'Nique costars as a frisky security official with a penchant for strip-searching handsome travelers; and NBA star Karl Malone has a cameo as himself. Tom Arnold, Arielle Kebbel, Godfrey(n)

programme.title: Traitor
programme.desc: Thriller with Don Cheadle (Hotel Rwanda) and Guy Pearce (Memento) with an undercover CIA agent within a terrorist cell marked as a terrorist suspect(n)

programme.title: Gang Related
programme.desc: Two corrupt cops organise illicit deals involving impounded drugs, but make the mistake of singling out an undercover agent as their next victim(n)

programme.title: Something From Nothing: The Art of Rap
programme.desc: In this riveting documentary, Ice-T explores the heart and soul of hip-hop music by speaking with some of the most-respected artists ever to step up to the mic(n)

programme.title: Soul Plane
programme.desc: Method Man and Kevin Hart star as the owners of an airline that caters to a black clientele in this outrageously funny takeoff on "Airplane!" Look for a top-flight performance by Snoop Dogg as a pilot who likes to get high both on and off the ground. Mo'Nique costars as a frisky security official with a penchant for strip-searching handsome travelers; and NBA star Karl Malone has a cameo as himself. Tom Arnold, Arielle Kebbel, Godfrey(n)

programme.title: American Son
programme.desc: A young man tries to tie up some loose ends before he goes to war in this independent drama from director Neil Abramson. Mike Holland (Nick Cannon) is nineteen years old and has just completed his basic training as a private in the United States Marine Corps. Mike has a four-day leave so he can visit his family for Thanksgiving, and then has orders for combat duty in Iraq. Mike wants to spend time with his family and friends before he ships out, but he doesn't want to tell anyone that he'll be stationed in Iraq. While taking the bus home to Bakersfield, California, Mike meets Cristina (Melonie Diaz), and it doesn't take long for him to realize he's infatuated with her. Mike makes a date to spend some time with Cristina, but he already has a busy schedule over the next four days. Mike catches up with his little sister (Erica Gluck), his doting mother (April Grace) and her taciturn new husband (Tom Sizemore), and sees his estranged father (Chi McBride) for the first time in years. Mike also hangs out with his best friend Jake (Matt O'Leary), but discovers he's begun taking a different path in life while Mike was in boot camp. And Mike happens to meet a disabled soldier back from Iraq (Jay Hernandez) who gives him an idea of what he can expect during his tour of duty. American Son was screened in competition at the 2008 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: New Man. Ghost finds himself trapped in a new business venture. Tommy escapes to Chicago for a meeting that takes a turn. With Ghost released, Jukebox and Kanan revisit their plan to kidnap Tariq(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: How to Build a Brand. Following Reggie and Missy's advice, Cam pays a visit to a dying, basketball-loving teen who hits him with a surprise request; Reggie suggests that Cam to put the family on the payroll(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Decisions. Missy works to score Reggie a membership in an exclusive country club that was founded by blacks, while Cam, in his search to support a church, gets a surprise from a pastor(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: New Man. Ghost finds himself trapped in a new business venture. Tommy escapes to Chicago for a meeting that takes a turn. With Ghost released, Jukebox and Kanan revisit their plan to kidnap Tariq(n)

Mike has a four-day leave so he can visit his family for Thanksgiving, and then has orders for combat duty in Iraq. Mike wants to spend time with his family and friends before he ships out, but he doesn't want to tell anyone that he'll be stationed in Iraq. While taking the bus home to Bakersfield, California, Mike meets Cristina (Melonie Diaz), and it doesn't take long for him to realize he's infatuated with her. Mike makes a date to spend some time with Cristina, but he already has a busy schedule over the next four days. Mike catches up with his little sister (Erica Gluck), his doting mother (April Grace) and her taciturn new husband (Tom Sizemore), and sees his estranged father (Chi McBride) for the first time in years. Mike also hangs out with his best friend Jake (Matt O'Leary), but discovers he's begun taking a different path in life while Mike was in boot camp. And Mike happens to meet a disabled soldier back from Iraq (Jay Hernandez) who gives him an idea of what he can expect during his tour of duty. American Son was screened in competition at the 2008 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.desc: Director Jon M. Chu takes the helm for this Step Up sequel set at the Maryland School for the Arts and following the journey of a rebellious street dancer who struggles to fit in at the prestigious school. Andie (Briana Evigan) may show great promise as a dancer, but she just can't seem to let go of her old life and get a fresh start. With Baltimore's hottest underground dance contest looming on the horizon, Andie joins forces with top dancer Chase (Robert Hoffman) while simultaneously helping to sharpen the skills of her outcast classmates. Perhaps if Andie, Chase, and their talented team of misfit dancers can earn the top slot at The Streets, the troubled new arrival can finally make her dreams a reality while also letting go of the past, and bounding confidently forward into the future(n)

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: Tennis player Peter Colt (Paul Bettany) is about to retire, unable to fulfill his dream of becoming one of the world's top players. He holds position 119 in the world ranking, but, all the same, he is invited to play in Wimbledon. The traditional tournament, where he finds himself for the first time, seems the ideal place for a farewell, to start a new life the following day as a tennis coach, though the plan might not be very appealing. At the same championship is Lizzie Bradbury (Kirsten Dunst), heading for stardom and dating the American, Jake Hammond (Austin Nichols), another great figure in the circuit. But Peter and Lizzie happen to meet one day and their destiny starts to look different from what seemed unchangeable(n)

Through that process they learn about a variety of topics, not just architecture and construction(n)

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Emotions run wild in the mind of a little girl who is uprooted from her peaceful life in the Midwest and forced to move to San Francisco in this Pixar adventure from director Pete Docter (Up, Monsters Inc.). Young Riley was perfectly content with her life when her father landed a new job in San Francisco, and the family moved across the country. Now, as Riley prepares to navigate a new city and attend a new school, her emotional headquarters becomes a hot bed of activity. As Joy (voice of Amy Poehler) attempts to keep Riley feeling happy and positive about the move, other emotions like Fear (voice of Bill Hader), Anger (voice of Lewis Black), Disgust (voice of Mindy Kaling) and Sadness (Phyllis Smith) make the transition a bit more complicated(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The Lonely. Discounting the pilot "Where Is Everybody?", "The Lonely" was the first Twilight Zone episode to be produced, though not the first to be shown. Jack Warden stars as futuristic convicted murderer James Corry, who has been sentenced to life imprisonment on a lonely asteroid. Out of compassion for Corry, Captain Allenby (John Dehner), leader of the supply ship that makes biannual stopovers at the asteroid, presents the prisoner with a "companion" -- a beautiful female android named Alicia (Jean Marsh). Future Mary Tyler Moore Show regular Ted Knight appears unbilled as a hostile crew member. Blessed with a poignant Bernard Herrmann musical score (which incorporates the first-season Twilight Zone theme music), "The Lonely" originally aired November 13, 1959(n)

programme.desc: Wedding Repercussions. In this sequel to the earlier episode The Wedding Show, the Bundys' cousin Jimmy (a young Abraham Benrubi) finds out that someone else slept with his wife Janie on their wedding day. In desperation, Jimmy appeals to Bud (David Faustino) to help him find the guilty party--little suspecting that Bud himself is the very guy he seeks. This episode offers yet another variation on the Bundy Family Credo: "Lie, Sell Shoes, and Lie"(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.sub-title: A Tisket, a Tasket, Can Peggy Make a Basket?
programme.desc: A Tisket, a Tasket, Can Peggy Make a Basket?. Season Eight of Married. . .With Children gets off to a roaring start as Al Bundy (Ed O'Neill) somehow manages to get hold of some tickets for an all-star charity basketball game. In the course of what follows, Al makes two mistakes: First, he allows Peggy to accompany him to the game; second, he changes seats with Peggy just as that selfsame seat is chosen for the $10,000 Grand Free Throw contest. Appearing more or less as themselves are NBA stars Vlade Divac, Clyde Drexler and Xavier "X Man" McDaniel, Chicago Bulls announcer Ray Clay, and most of the Bulls' cheerleading squad(n)

programme.desc: No Chicken, No Check. Kelly (Christina Applegate) and Bud (David Faustino) pool their savings to buy a car, figuring that they'll be able to share the vehicle equally. This doesn't happen of course, and when the two Bundy kids take their dates to the drive-in on the same night, the wrong kind of sparks begin to fly. Also, Al Bundy (Ed O'Neill) brings home a live chicken for reasons that make sense only if you're Al Bundy(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Take My Wife, Please. Katey Sagal plays a dual role in this episode, as Peg Bundy and as The Grim Reaper "herself." Arriving at the Bundy home to claim Al (Ed O'Neill) on Halloween, the Reaper is unmoved when he suggests that she take the life of Michael Bolton) instead--but she does agree to spare our hero if he can find one Bundy who will say that he or she truly needs him. Elsewhere, Marcy persuades the other Bundys to impersonate the Village People for her Halloween party, with Peg as the Indian, Kelly (Christina Applegate) as the Sailor, Bud (David Faustino) as the Construction Worker, and Guess Who? As the Leather Man. The real Village People (Alexander Briley, David Hodo, Glenn M. Hughes, G. Jeffrey Olson, Felipe Rose and Raymond Simpson) show up in time to perform (what else?) "YMCA" in this Emmy-nominated episode(n)

The group's first act is to stage a coup at the TV talk show "The Masculine Feminist", bind and gag host Jerry Springer--yes, THAT Jerry Springer--and deliver their macho manifesto. Alas, the bar is opening on the same night that Peg (Katey Sagal) and Marcy (Amanda Bearse) want to attend the live "Jeffersons Movin On Up Tour." The result is a loud and outsized brawl--and not just at the sports bar(n)

programme.desc: How Green Was My Apple. When an apple on the Bundys' tree is seen hanging over the D'Arcy's yard, a battle royal ensues between the two neighboring families. In fine Laurel and Hardy tradition, the hostilities begin with a few small volleys designed to embarrass but not injure. Before long, however, the tit-for-tat warfare gets out of hand, and the results are truly explosive. Highlights in this episode include a pointed reference to Ted Danson's recent embarrassing blackface turn, as well as cameo appearances by sitcom favorites Danny Bonaduce, Dave Madden and Gary Coleman (the latter going ballistic when someone mentions that he looks like himself!)(n)

In the Season 1 premiere, Steve develops a crush on a cheerleader. He doesn't have a chance with her until Stan steps in with romance advice and rigs the school election to make Steve class president(n)

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: Threat Levels. This animated series begins its regular run with super-macho CIA guy Stan Smith (voice of series creator Seth MacFarlane) dealing---badly---with the fact that his wife, Francine (Wendy Schaal), suddenly makes more money than he does after he gets her a job as a real-estate agent. So Stan fights back (literally, as it turns out)(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: A Hero Sits Next Door. When Peter accidentally knocks out Mr Weed's best player for the company's softball team, Guillermo, he is forced to find someone else as good as him. He has a lot of trouble until his new neighbour, Joe, shows his credentials. But, when Peter finds out Joe's in a wheelchair, he is jealous of him and thinks his family idolises Joe more than him because he's a hero. Peter pulls a crazy stunt by trying to rescue a bunch of people from a bank robbery(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: The Son Also Draws. Chris (voice of Seth Green) wants out of the Scouts, and no wonder, with a Scout leader who always calls the troop "girls," and who shrieks at Chris for sitting outside the semicircle. Chris would rather devote his time to drawing, but he doesn't have the heart to tell Peter (voice of Seth MacFarlane). Peter is so psyched about Chris being a Scout that he even builds him a go-cart for the soap-box derby. Surprisingly, Speed Racer turns out to be one of Chris' opponents. The race ends (well, starts) disastrously, and Chris is kicked out of the troop. But Peter refuses to take it lying down, getting the family into the car for a drive to the Scouts' main office in New York. Brian (MacFarlane) stays behind, explaining that he's been to New York, and "it's like Prague, without the whimsy." Peter gets lost en route, and a bathroom emergency brings the family to Geronimo's Palace, a Native American casino. While Peter uses the bathroom, Lois (voice of Alex Borstein) wanders over to video poker, where a casino worker reassures her, "Technically, it's not really gambling; it's just us trying to rebuild our shattered culture after you raped our land and defiled our women." Lois gives it a try, and has soon gambled away the car (shades of Lost in America, which the creators acknowledge on the DVD commentary). Peter tries to get the family's money back by claiming to be part Native American. The council of elders decides that he must go on a "vision quest," a spiritual journey into the wilderness without food, water, or shoes, to prove his ancestry. Chris goes along, hoping for an opportunity to tell Peter that he doesn't want to be a Scout(n)

programme.desc: An Atlanta businesswoman prepares to walk down the aisle in a ceremony where everything is pink.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Having already tried on 65 traditional white dresses, Lauren is relieved when a pink gown finally catches her eye, but her father might prefer her to keep on looking.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Bride-to-be Kelli seeks a Scarlett O'Hara-inspired dress, but her mother-in-law is determined to see her in a ball gown, so they may well leave the bridal salon empty-handed.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: The Big Day
programme.desc: The story of Amanda, a self-proclaimed `daddy's girl' who has a huge budget for her wedding and will stop at nothing to get exactly what she wants.(n)

programme.title: Always the Bridesmaid
programme.desc: New series. Brides arrange blind dates for their bridesmaids - to take place on the wedding day.(n)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.sub-title: 10 Years Later And Busier Than Ever!.
programme.desc: Rock star Elle King visits the shop and enlists the aid of the first ever male consultant. The team also has to deal with the show's strangest ever request.(n)

programme.title: The Spouse House
programme.sub-title: I'm Going To Get Married Here!.
programme.desc: Reality show in which 12 strangers live together in the hope of finding love. Each week, contestants must accept a marriage proposal or face eviction.(n)

programme.title: The Spouse House
programme.desc: Two love triangles break out, while Missy's interruption in the engagement ceremony has repercussions that may spell the end of her time on the show.(n)

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Kapu (Forbidden). Five-0 investigates the murder of Professor Joel Cutler, whose body was found decomposing in a tub of acid at Oahu University(n)

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Olelo Ho'opa'i Make (Death Sentence). Chin is kidnapped in the middle of the night and placed in a prison dressed as an inmate. He must escape before the other prisoners realize he is a member of Five-0(n)

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Hana I Wa 'Ia (Scandal). The team investigate the murder of a prostitute who was found in the bed of a missing politician. Elsewhere, Danny goes to court to find out if he will get partial custody of Grace(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Aftershock. The detectives and lawyers are deeply affected after witnessing an execution. Dr. Geller: Len Cariou. Jaime: Jennifer Garner. Cathy: Jennifer Bill. Manny: Bill Otis. Ms. Stadler: Erin Cohen. Kincaid: Jill Hennessy. Briscoe: Jerry Orbach. Curtis: Benjamin Bratt. McCoy: Sam Waterston(n)

programme.title: Arrow
programme.desc: Deathstroke. Oliver does everything in his power to protect his family when Slade makes his move. Plus, Isabel has her eye on Queen Consolidated(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Dead Man Dating. Piper falls for the ghost of a recently murdered man who needs her help to ensure that he receives a proper burial before an ancient evil spirit can claim his soul. Phoebe is able to help others and earn some extra money when she gets a job as a psychic, while Prue discovers a devastating betrayal(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Dream Sorcerer. Prue's sleep is disturbed by strange visions in which she's taunted by a sinister and threatening man who has taken over her subconscious. Tired of being single, Phoebe and Piper cast a spell to attract men, but the magic is too strong and they're plagued by way too many admirers(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The Wedding from Hell. When Piper is hired to do the catering at a wedding, the sisters discover that a powerful demon goddess has replaced the bride-to-be in order to prey upon the groom and conceive an evil child. The sisters must find the real bride to stop the groom from entering a state of unholy matrimony(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Devil May Care. Dean kidnaps Crowley in order to find the demons on earth. Meanwhile, Abaddon reappears and plans to take over hell(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: I'm No Angel. A group of angels hunts Castiel. Dean and Sam race to find their friend before the angels do. Homeless, Castiel tries to make his way through the city and comes across some unexpected surprises(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Slumber Party. Sam and Dean meet Dorothy from Oz and the wicked witch when they locate an ancient computer in the Men of Letters house that dislodges a hidden hex bag that in turn unleashes a magical green-webbed wall. Dorothy became trapped in the web years ago to stop the witch from finding the key that would open the gate that connected their world to Oz(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Dog Dean Afternoon. Sam and Dean investigate two gruesome murders and realize that a German shepherd witnessed both deaths, so they use a spell that allows Dean to communicate with the dog. Unfortunately, the spell comes with unexpected side effects(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Head in the Abutment. The death of a professional hockey player is investigated after his headless corpse is found in a river, and Booth's love of the sport proves to be an asset in the case, but it also reunites him with an old rival and puts him back on the ice(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Stiff in the Cliff. A billionaire explorer's remains are discovered in Antarctica 10 years after he disappeared, but the Jeffersonian's Dr Clark Edison winds up on a list of murder suspects since he was a member of the expedition. Meanwhile, Cam clashes with her sister when she arrives in town to help with her wedding plans(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Jewel in the Crown. A corpse at a glass recycling plant has a diamond stuck in its jaw, and Inspector Rousseau suspects a descendant of French nobility—who turns out to be the victim's husband—may have had something to do with the murder. Meanwhile, Booth learns he has an eye ailment; and Hodgins thinks a ghost is following him(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Nightmare Within the Nightmare. In the Series 11 finale, the search for the Puppeteer, a serial killer who turns his victims into marionettes, continues, but Brennan can't shake her guilt of failing to catch the perpetrator due to her brief period of retirement(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Pilot. David Boreanaz returns to screens as an FBI agent teamed with a feisty anthropologist to crack crime using victims' bones. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance Brennan teams up with FBI agent Booth to investigate the famous unsolved murder of a young female Senate intern(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Man in the SUV. Temperance works on a case where a man exploded a car at an outdoor café, killing and injuring several occupants. Santana: Jose Zuniga. Gibson: Dave Roberson. Farid Masruk: Nicholas Massouh. Sahar Masruk: Bahar Soomekh. Tessa Jankow: Ane Dudek(n)

programme.title: Blade II
programme.desc: A vampire slayer teams up with the undead to take down a band of mutant bloodsuckers(n)

programme.title: Blade: Trinity
programme.desc: In this outing of the series, Blade has become a hated enemy of the bloodsucking community, and as they gather in their desert compound, a group of vampires plot to eliminate Blade once and for all by turning the mortal community against him(n)

programme.title: Blade II
programme.desc: A vampire slayer teams up with the undead to take down a band of mutant bloodsuckers(n)

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: One Man's Treasure. A man's body is discovered in an apartment building's garbage chute, and two women surface to identify the deceased---his wife and his fiancée. Castle and Beckett's investigation uncovers the man's complex double life. DB Woodside guest stars(n)

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: The Fifth Bullet. Nathan Fillion stars in the smash hit crime drama series about a bestselling mystery novelist who teams up with a New York detective to solve murders. Castle and Beckett investigate the shooting of an art dealer, but the bullet is mysteriously missing from the crime scene(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Causa Mortis. Season Seven of Law & Order begins with the good news that Assistant D.A. Claire Kincaid (Jill Hennessy) was not immediately killed in the car accident which took her out of commission at the end of Season Five (though actress Hennessy would not return to the show, necessitating a later episode which confirmed beyond doubt that Kincaid was never going to come back). New to the D.A.'s office is Jamie Ross (Carey Lowell), an ambitious young woman whose approach to her job does not always meet with the approval of her partner Jack McCoy (Sam Waterston). In the season's first episode, Ross intends to use a gruesomely graphic audiotape to put the noose around the neck of carjacker-murderer Fernando Salva (Victor Sierra)(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: I.D. The second season of the British spin-off of the popular franchise that retains the syncopated action and as much energy as the original US series(n)

programme.title: Arrow
programme.desc: The Man Under the Hood. Arrow battles Slade, which results in a member of Team Arrow going to the hospital. Meanwhile, Thea hits her breaking point; and Laurel struggles with a new secret(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The Fourth Sister. A troubled teenage witch comes to the sisters for help and guidance, hoping that the Halliwells will become her mentors, but it transpires that the girl is an unwitting pawn in the schemes of an evil sorceress. Meanwhile, Prue tries to find time with Andy, and Phoebe and Piper compete for Leo's attention(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.sub-title: The Truth Is Out There...and It Hurts
programme.desc: The Truth Is Out There...and It Hurts. After having a vision, Phoebe seeks a potential murder victim (Michelle Brookhurst) of a serial killer (Brad Greenquist) with a grisly feature revealed only when he confronts his victims; and Prue casts a truth spell to find out how Andy feels about her. Phoebe: Alyssa Milano(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The Witch Is Back. Prue's (Shannen Doherty) sinister boss, Rex Buckland (Neil Roberts), and his confederate Hannah Webster (Leigh Allyn Baker) demonstrate anew that they can't be trusted as far as they can be thrown when warlock Matthew Tate (Billy Wirth) is released from a centuries-old curse. With Rex and Hannah's help, Matthew schemes to steal the "Book of Shadows" from the Halliwell girls, whereupon he will destroy their bloodline for all time. Tyler Layton makes a guest appearance as 300-year-old witch Melinda Warren, a very significant person in the lives of the Halliwells -- not to mention the demonic Matthew Tate's spurned sweetheart(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Heaven Can't Wait. Castiel gets a job and starts enjoying life as a human, but when he learns about some local disappearances he asks Dean to help him investigate. Meanwhile, Crowley agrees to help decipher the tablet in return for one phone call to hell(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Bad Boys. Dean helps an old friend with a ghost problem at a home for delinquent boys. Dean was sent there years before for stealing food. When Sam learns about Dean's past he is stunned and asks for more information, which Dean is reluctant to give(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Rock and a Hard Place. Sheriff Jody Mills (guest star Kim Rhodes) calls Sam and Dean for help investigating a series of disappearances in which each of the victims was a member of a local church chastity group. But soon after Sam and Dean infiltrate the group, Dean vanishes without trace(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Holy Terror. An angel war begins and a massive number of angels are slaughtered. Sam and Dean investigate and run into Castiel who is soon captured and tortured. Meanwhile, Dean questions Ezekiel's demands and wonders if it is time to tell Sam the truth(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: A Boy in a Tree. Forensic expert Brennan and FBI agent Booth head to an elite prep school where a student was hanged. Was it suicide or murder?(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Man in the Bear. A human arm is found inside a bear's stomach, and Brennan and Booth learn that ritualistic cannibalism was involved. Ranger Sherman Rivers: Steve Reevis. programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: A Boy in a Bush. Temperance and Booth search for a serial pedophile who assaulted and killed a 6-year-old boy(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Man in the Wall. Booth and Brennan are intrigued by the mummified body of a hip-hop DJ, unearthed behind the wall of a nightclub(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Man on Death Row. Brennan and Booth suspect a condemned man may be innocent, and fight for his stay of execution. It's when they exhume a body that doubts emerge(n)

programme.title: The Help
programme.desc: Drama based on Kathryn Stockett's best-selling novel. An aspiring writer decides to focus on the story of Mississippi's black maids - much to the consternation of her well-to-do white friends. Desperate to put her college education to good use, she decides to interview her best friend's housekeeper, but she is not the only one with a tale to tell. Soon most of the town's help is coming forward, but they are all at risk in a country on the brink of huge social change(n)

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: When the family of Clyde Shelton are killed during a home invasion and hotshot prosecutor Nick Rice fails to deliver justice, Shelton wages a deadly vigilante campaign in this nail-biting thriller(n)
